p: BTV range increased from RCP 2.6 to RCP 8.5 (potential distributional area increased by 8.11% between present-day and RCP 2.6, and by 9.08% between present-day and RCP 8.5). Differences were also noted in the future potential BTV ranges of different models within each climate scenario ( S4 File); the potential distributions under the different model conditions are summarized in the electronic supplementary materials as a GeoTIFF dataset ( https://figshare.com/s/ac5383809b411c0f8779).
